resources.string: Removing a rootkit from an infected computer is extremely difficult.
As a reaction to a rash of corporate fraud, the Gramm-Leach-Bliley Act (GLBA) is an attempt to fight corporate corruption.
In a general sense, security is defined as a state of freedom from danger or risk.
A script kiddie is an unskilled user who downloads automated attack software to attack computers.
SAN can be shared between servers but cannot be extended over geographical distances.
